analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/8/0x3c139c5ef130d4db3793b1ce7017e6b326d66f2b.sol:
	Contract TripusCandyToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/8/0x3c139c5ef130d4db3793b1ce7017e6b326d66f2b.sol#130-132)
	 - getTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x3c139c5ef130d4db3793b1ce7017e6b326d66f2b.sol#133-147)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

TripusCandyToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/8/0x3c139c5ef130d4db3793b1ce7017e6b326d66f2b.sol#61-63) shadows:
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/8/0x3c139c5ef130d4db3793b1ce7017e6b326d66f2b.sol#36)
